meta.title: Software Development and Architecture Advanced
meta.description: We move into big system thinking, advanced patterns and how to keep complex software fast, safe and changeable over time.

meta.title: Software Architecture Foundations - Complete Lifecycle Coverage

scope.title: Software Development and Architecture Advanced
scope.description: We move into big system thinking, advanced patterns and how to keep complex software fast, safe and changeable over time.
scope.summary: We move into big system thinking, advanced patterns and how to keep complex software fast, safe and changeable over time.
learningObjectives: Analyse architecture decisions in complex systems using realistic constraints and failure modes.
Explain advanced patterns (events, CQRS, observability) in practical terms.
Evaluate risk and resilience trade offs and their operational consequences.
Apply decision recording and governance thinking to keep systems changeable over time.
